content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a photographer, and I'm really excited to share my work with the world.
That sounds amazing! I'm an artist, and I'm always looking for inspiration.
What kind of art do you create?
I'm a painter, and I love to paint animals.
Oh, that's awesome! I love animals, too! What's your favorite animal to paint?
I love to paint dogs, because they're so expressive.
That's so cool! I've never met a dog that wasn't a good boy or girl.
Me neither! I'm so glad I met you.
Me too! I'm excited to see your art.
I'm excited to share it with you!
